    public abstract class AbstractNRWLikeAccEditor
extends AbstractAccEditor
    This is an editor for editing NRW-like acceptance conditions.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        editor - an editor of an automaton containing the acceptance condition acc
